About.heading: George Apostolidis
About.description1: Based in Athens, George Apostolidis Technical Office provides comprehensive design, supervision, and construction services for over a decade.
About.description2: Our philosophy combines technical excellence with contemporary aesthetics. Every project receives the same attention to detail—whether it's a complete apartment renovation or new building construction.
About.description3: As a licensed civil engineer, George Apostolidis personally oversees every stage of the project, ensuring regulatory compliance and high construction standards.

renovation.title: Renovation
renovation.description: Complete renovation of residential and commercial spaces. From design study and material selection to final turnkey delivery.

construction.title: New Construction
construction.description: Complete implementation of new buildings—from initial design and permitting to construction and delivery. Residences, apartment buildings, and commercial spaces.
